name: Burger Bop
description:
Bop those burgers, sodas, and candies so your chubbster boy don't eat too much and die of type 2 diabetes. But you better spare those green apples and give that boy the nutrients he deserves. Beat your high-score as you beat these corporate trash foods out of this man's diet.

This is a personal project I might upload to the App Store/Google Play, and being a solo developer with this being my first experience with mobile games and pixel art, any criticism is much appreciated! Also if it wasn't clear this is just a demo/prototype. Enjoy!
